price: 16. Zeg: “Zullen jullie Allah vertellen over jullie godsdienst?” Terwijl Allah alles wat in de hemelen en wat op aarde is kent en Allah alwetend is van alles.
arabic: قُلۡ أَتُعَلِّمُونَ ٱللَّهَ بِدِينِكُمۡ وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: qul atuʿallimūna al-laha bidīnikum wal-lahu yaʿlamu mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wal-lahu bikulli shayin ʿalīmun
